ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Double Wammie!
ygData.msgSnippet: Follow up to this, Killed phinnie 2 times after that and got my spine finally on the second one, which was about my 15th or so raid. Yesterday I spent a good
ygData.messageBody:
Follow up to this, Killed phinnie 2 times after that and got my spine
finally on the second one, which was about my 15th or so raid. Yesterday I
spent a good part of the day raising my gnome faction, I did not want to
charm the little bugger so I killed many many minotaurs and meldraths and am
now dubious to gemchoppers and warmly to kingakanon. Funny how you can kill
gnomes for months on end and then just kill minos for a day to be ok with
them. Tonight I multiquest the whip and I'll just need to spawn trak *joy*

Question though, I picked up many weird items while in steamfont from
various areas

Ground spawns:
8 or so Iron Oxide (was told they are dyes)
8 or so Russet oxides (was told they are dyes)
20 or so Moss covered drake scales
A dusty skull from meldrath's room, ground spawn, idents as something
lightforge's skull, no drop
Oh and 3 mino heros, now i have to figure out if im kos in qeynos from
killing beef and brian mcabee
encrypted document from a kobold missionary, idents as something of some zek
(sorry i forgot), also no drop.

Any idea/insight on any of this stuff?

Minkin


-----Original Message-----
From: Blitz Krieg [mailto:blzkrg@...]
Sent: August 29, 2001 7:40 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Double Wammie!


Congratz! EQ Days don't get much better than that. :)

Darkfox
----- Original Message -----
From: Cyr, Thierry
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Monday, August 27, 2001 9:34 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Double Wammie!


This weekend my guild decided to try out Naggy with alts on friday so we
could get our hands on another rez stick afterwards. we got him, he
dropped
a CoF and 2 9/25 piercers. Then we waited for rage, and waited, and waited
some more, finally on sunday Rage showed up, and dropped 3 red scales
woot.
I log out afterwards cause had to go out of town for a few hours. When I
log in later, they're buffing up for Gore, so I got there asap and I got
my
white scale from her! I'm in utter shock, got my 2 scales on the same
day,
now its just a matter of time before phinny drops his spine for me. Just
wanted to share my luck 8)

Minkin
one very happy bard
RIP
A Ro
